scripts.gh-pages: cp ./index.js gh-pages/vue-props-template.js; cd gh-pages; git add ./vue-props-template.js
scripts.watch: chokidar ./*.js test/*.js -c 'npm run lint && npm run test && echo OK \(`date`\)'

name: vue-props-template
description: Write vue's props through template literal.
author: Ginpei
